title: can anyone help me,pls =)
body:
help!!!
i am having a problem with my league of legend after i log into, the page shows that " we're attempting to automatically reconnect you to league of legends. if your internet connection is otherwise ok, check our suppor page for possible soulutions", it is the website " https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues".

i went to the website, and do any possible methods as they teach:D. i still cant solve the problem.
pls,pls, help me!

replies.body: If you've already gone through all of the steps, including the bits on Port Forwarding and configuring your DNS settings, go ahead and reach out to our tech team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). Do make sure that you've gone through all of those steps first, as they cover the basics and typically fixes for connection problems.
